com.software.reuze

Interface s_i_PitchClassSets

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    s_SoundCipher, s_SoundCipherScore

    public interface s_i_PitchClassSets
    An interface storing pitch class [scales and modes] constants. These constants can be used to make the code more readable and to relive the programmer from having to regularly look up the interval patterns for the pitch classes. All sets are for scales or modes that have C as a root pitch. Use simple offset math for scales in other keys.
    The constants are implemented by both the SoundCipher and SCScore classes so they can be accessed using 'dot' notation from instances of any of these classes, for example;

    after: SoundCipher sc = new SoundCipher(this);
    access constants using: sc.MAJOR

    after: SCSCore score = new SCScore();
    access constants using: score.IONIAN

    This class borrows from the jMusic Scales interface.
    Author:
    Andrew Sorensen, Andrew Brown, Andrew Troedson, Adam Kirby
